criterions.comment: openjdk-8 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-lts package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-17 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
openjdk-18: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-19').
openjdk-19: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-20').
openjdk-20: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'superseded by openjdk-21').
openjdk-21 package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
